item.title: Karen add a quote by Morrissey
item.description: "There's more to life than books, you know. But not much more." -- Morrissey

item.title: Karen add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "I read the fuck out of every book I can get my hands on." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "After all, reading is arguably a far more creative and imaginative process than writing; when the reader creates emotion in their head, or the colors of the sky during the setting sun, or the smell of a warm summer's breeze on their face, they should reserve as much praise for themselves as they do for the writer - perhaps more." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Karen add a quote by Arnold Lobel
item.description: "Books to the ceiling, Books to the sky, My pile of books is a mile high. How I love them! How I need them! I'll have a long beard by the time I read them." -- Arnold Lobel

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Karen add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "She is too fond of books, and it has turned her brain." -- Louisa May Alcott
